short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension converts text to speech

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Text to Speech Converter, an innovative tool designed to transform written text into natural and expressive spoken words. With this cutting-edge technology, you can bring your text to life and give it a voice that resonates with your audience.

The Text to Speech Converter utilizes state-of-the-art deep learning algorithms to generate high-quality, human-like speech. It analyzes the textual input, taking into account various linguistic factors such as syntax, semantics, and intonation patterns, to deliver a truly immersive and engaging auditory experience.
